finalProject

Class Issuer

  • java.lang.Object
    • finalProject.Issuer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CreditCardInfo

    public class Issuer
extends java.lang.Object
    Description:This class provides many methods to determine the issuer and IINRANGE of a valid credit card number. if issuer is not American express, Dinner Club, Discover, InstaPayment, MasterCard, JCB, LASER, Maestro,Visa, Visa electron class will return "Undefined"
    Version:
    05/05/2017
    Author:
    nguyen

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String findIssuer()
      findIssuer method will return the value in issuerBank field which holds the issuer's name of the validCard

      This method returns the value in the inRange field
